author: Shawn Knox
title: Guns and ammo stolen from Regina pawn shop - Regina | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 27, 2017 12:35 pm Guns and ammo stolen from Regina pawn shop By Shawn Knox Web Producer Global News 
Police are looking to the public for information after guns and ammunition were stolen from Pawn King on Park Street. Google Streetview What is this?

Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - 
Police are looking to the public for information after guns and ammunition were stolen from Pawn King on Park Street. 
The robbery happened just before 6 a.m. on Sunday morning. 
Police are worried about the theft because of the potential danger the stolen guns could have in the wrong hands. 
Anyone with information is asked to contact police at 306-777-6500 or Crime Stoppers at 1-80–222-8477. © 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
